Samuel Vierny

Web Developer and Music Producer

---

Web Development

I am just starting out as a web developer with skills in html, CSS and Javascript. I love helping people design beautiful virtual spaces to express their work.

Take a look at some of my projects on my github here although you have already seen one by visiting this page :)

Music

Music is a vital part of my everyday life – whether I'm listening to atmospheric techno as I code, or indie as I cook, it means a lot to me. Check out this Spotify playlist where I put my favourite songs.

I compose rhythmic and atmospheric electronica. Some of my early (and more experimental) songs are published @Enkidu on Sound Cloud and YouTube. I hope to release more recent compositions in an album next year.

Photography

Travel
